title: Audits related to login events aren't visible in the Audit UI
content:
You are unable to see the login related audits in the Audit UI.

Cause

This issue occurs if the IdM audit data output isn't set in the IdM portal.

Solution

  1. Log in to the IdM Admin Portal as the suite-admin: https://<host>/idm-admin.
  2. Go to System Settings and select AUDIT tab.
  3. Set Audit Destination to "http".
    By default, this setting is empty, and there's no audit log output and there are no audit events generated. This means if you leave this setting empty, you won't be able to enable audit for IdM.
